#Usage
#<Name of motion>,     <Path to Gif Animation>                    <FPS used>    <PanX value>, <PanY value>, <Zoom Value>, <LookLeft value>, <LookRight value>, <Tilt Value>
Close Rotation Right, ./motion_images/close_rotation_right.gif,     -1             ,[ 1.0,         0.0,          0.20,          -0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
Close Rotation Left, ./motion_images/close_rotation_left.gif,       -1             ,[-1.0,         0.0,          0.20,           0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
Medium Rotation Right, ./motion_images/medium_rotation_right.gif,   -1             ,[ 1.0,         0.0,          0.15,          -0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
Medium Rotation Left, ./motion_images/medium_rotation_left.gif,     -1             ,[-1.0,         0.0,          0.15,           0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
Far Rotation Right, ./motion_images/far_rotation_right.gif,         -1             ,[ 1.0,         0.0,          0.12,          -0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
Far Rotation Left, ./motion_images/far_rotation_left.gif,           -1             ,[-1.0,         0.0,          0.12,           0.20,            0.0,                0.0]
